name: dashiki
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a loose piece of clothing, usually covering the top half of the body and with a brightly coloured design, traditionally worn in West Africa: He stood out from the crowd in his tie-dyed dashiki. Many of the women wear clothing inspired by African styles, including dashikis and head wraps.
More examplesFewer examplesSome wore dreadlocks and dashikis, others wore "Black Power" T-shirts.The artist wore all white: dashiki, trousers, and shoes.Clad in multicoloured dashikis, he and his band opened the show with a set of West African-influenced rock. The preacher is an ebullient young man in a yellow dashiki.The Black Pride movement of the 1970s brought popularity for big Afros and dashikis.
